EmailTemplate.subject: MyAerospace Passphrase Updated
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
MyAerospace Passphrase Updated
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Thank you for using Honeywell MyAerospace. Your passphrase has been successfully updated.
Note:
This email is being sent from an unmonitored mailbox. If you need further assistance, please contact a customer support team member at:
1-800-601-3099 US / Canada (Toll Free) 1-602-365-3099 International Choose Option 7 (Web Support)
Thank You, Honeywell Aerospace Customer Support Team
